name: My Nicole
greetingText:
I really like your name btw! 
 and boy that smile...
wishText: May your day be filled with love and joy ;)
textInChatBox: Happiest birthday, baby! yay! I love youuu! (i want a kiss after this pls)
text2: I thought a normal greeting would do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
replayText: click here, if you want to watch it again.
